Posts.Content: Aug 10, 2014 07:22AM OvercomingOne wrote: Glennie  You have to be post menopausal to be qualified for the oncotype DX test.  So it wasn't a choice for you since you haven't gone through menopause.   Just found you here..  Lol. Just starting to look around on this site.  This is a good idea for a blog.  Tests will be ongoing for the rest of our lives I think :-/. Love ya  O2
